title: The Billionaire's Passion (The Billionaire's Kiss, Book Four): A Billionaire Alpha Romance
description: Introducing THE BILLIONAIRE'S PASSION, book four in the hot and sexy new BILLIONAIRE'S KISS series by Olivia Thorne! "Billionaire architect Grant Carlson seduced me, stole my phone, and hired me to track down a serial killer – in that order. Then the killer lured me to a deserted art gallery. If I thought I might die just hours before… now I’m pretty much convinced of it."On the run and out of options, Eve and Grant turn to an unlikely source of help. But a killer is fast on their trail, and what was supposed to be a grand escape may be nothing more than a temporary stay of execution...*A hot and sexy alpha billionaire romance, perfect for fans of J.S. Scott, Hannah Ford, Kelly Favor, Ellie Danes, Cassie Cross, and M.S. Parker*
author: Olivia Thorne
